name: Ovida
description: Ovida is an AI-driven communication skills platform that helps people master critical workplace conversations through personalized feedback and skill development. By combining advanced AI analysis with expert-designed learning journeys, we enable organizations to develop their people's communication and leadership capabilities at scale - focusing on the human interactions that will remain essential in the AI era, while delivering results at a fraction of traditional training cost and time.
